text: How can I write a simple RPC in Julia? I want to take some simple I/O transport (pipes / sockets / websockets / etc.), some serialization protocol (JSON / MsgPack), and a multiplexer to route messages to corresponding functions. Is HTTP-protocol and routers from HTTP.jl the only option? What if I don't want to use HTTP - should I write it myself, or is there some non-HTTP standards or packages?
